sub_title: EUV High-NA Optics FDE at Carl Zeiss
summary:
Multi-skilled mechatronics engineer with nine years of international working experience and broad education. Have explored from lecturing in university to work in the industry, first in the electrical design of gas turbines, later as a Wireline Engineer in well exploration in North Africa. Moved to the semiconductor industry, first with ASML and later with TRUMPF at the EUV laser technology.  Currently working at Carl Zeiss in The Netherlands at the High-NA Optics System.

Versatile professional with expertise among different industries leading multicultural teams. Highly motivated person characterized by a strong commitment to excellence.

His interests are related to technological innovation and development of new products or services that increase the quality of human life in a sustainable way. Traveling has been his deep passion, after resided in eight countries and visited countries from almost all the continents.
